com.iLabs.spice.services.impl
Class PersonImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.iLabs.spice.common.core.ServiceImplBase
      com.iLabs.spice.services.impl.PersonImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPerson
public class PersonImpl
extends ServiceImplBase
implements IPerson

The Class implements all the method of IPerson interface for implementing person service of Open-Social site.

snrkumar
